density ridges
*CHANGE OUTPUT FILE NAME*
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
library(ggridges)
temp<-temp[which(temp$Type!="Mock"),]
plotme<-function(yaxis,labelme,mytitle,nameme){
  ggplot(temp,aes(x=yaxis,fill=Type, y=Type,group=Type))+
  geom_density_ridges(aes(color=Type) ,alpha=.5,scale=.5,jittered_points=TRUE,position="raincloud",scale=.2,point_size=.5) +
    facet_wrap(~BvsS)+
  xlab(labelme)+
  ggtitle(mytitle)+
  theme()+
  scale_x_continuous(name=labelme,limits = c(2,10))+
    #scale_color_manual(values=c("#EB7D5B", "#FED23F", "#B5D33D","#6CA2EA","#442288"))+
    #scale_fill_manual(values=c("#EB7D5B", "#FED23F", "#B5D33D","#6CA2EA","#442288"))
    scale_fill_viridis(discrete=TRUE,end=.9) +
    scale_color_viridis(discrete=TRUE,end=.9) +
    theme_minimal()+
    theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust=.5), panel.spacing.x = unit(4, "lines"))
}
#tiff(file="~/Desktop/Analyzed-data_HeLa-KD_7May20/batch-graphs/combined-datasets_eqNum_noMock_individualPunctaInt.tiff",width=2800,height=2800,res=600)
plotme(temp$MeanObjIntensity,"puncta mean intensity (A.U.)","LC3 Puncta Mean Intensity")
#dev.off()

tiff(file="~/Desktop/Analyzed-data_HeLa-KD_7May20/batch-graphs/EqCellNumber-graphs/combined-datasets_eqNum_noMock_individualPunctaVol_enlarge2-10_30Jun20.tiff",width=3000,height=3000,res=600)
plotme(temp$Volume,expression("LC3 Puncta Volume (um"^'3'*")"),"LC3 Puncta Volumes")
dev.off()
```


Violin plots of individual puncta values

```{r}
plotme<-function(yaxis,labelme,mytitle,nameme){
  ggplot(temp,aes(x=Type,y=yaxis,fill=BvsS))+
  geom_violin(width=.2,position = position_dodge(0.9)) +
  ylab(labelme)+
  ggtitle(mytitle)+
  theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust=.5))
}
#tiff(file="~/Desktop/Analyzed-data/11Mar20_individualPuncta.tiff",width=2800,height=2800,res=600)
```
